name: Christopher HARRISON, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Harrison v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Christopher HARRISON, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of May, 2012, the “Application for Relief Nunc Pro Tunc ” is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
44 A.3d 656
Christopher HARRISON, Petitioner v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Respondent.
